title: Beautifully remodeled penthouse unit!
posting_body: Wonderful top floor home with volume ceilings, views of the courtyard and pool, and an abundance of natural light.
Kitchen features new shaker cabinetry, quartz countertops, all stainless appliances, and designer fixtures.
Full bathroom has been completely remodeled including updated plumbing, new porcelain bathtub, freshly tiled shower, hexagon tile floor, new vanity and sleek fixtures.
The kitchen and bathroom are simply gorgeous!
Additional features include new flooring and baseboards throughout, updated lighting and fresh paint.
The home includes a dedicated, covered garage parking space, locking storage unit and in-home stackable washer/dryer.
Common area features a courtyard entertainment space, sparkling swimming pool and spa, a workout room and more.
This is a well-maintained, clean, quiet complex conveniently located to BART, freeways, shopping and restaurants.
Walking distance to biking trails and close to downtown Walnut Creek!
